title: Holding your money hostage in the name of security
text:
Not even close to the worst banking app in the state. My in-law in Australia asked me to open an account so she can send me the money she owes me. After receiving the money I transferred $1000 to my bank account a few days ago. I was trying to send the rest today and it got declined. As you may have noticed, there is no number you can call to talk to a live agent and live chat takes FOREVER till someone gets back to you with a scripted response and when you ask a question then s/he ghosts you. 
Long story short, after 8 hours they sent me a text saying there is a scam going on and we need you to write some information ( provided by them) on a piece of paper and take a selfie with it (my face in the picture) to verify who i am. It reminds me those hostage movies that they take a photo with the today newspaper to show they are alive. 
Anyhow, it is sad they don‚Äôt know the basic of business and customer services. That‚Äôs how businesses get screwed and not take off. 
I won‚Äôt comply with such a stupid request and already provided all information that tells who I am.

title: Extremely Disappointed!
text:
So I‚Äôve used Revolut for a few months almost a year now and it has been great. But unfortunately, and just like in life, it takes one wrong doing to really dismissed all the good something or someone has ever done. I‚Äôve recently been charged wrongly with a consume that I did not authorize, causing my acc to fall into the negative balance, obviously I reported the issue and my claimed was rejected. Now I have to get the money I apparently ‚Äúowe‚Äù within 7 days or ‚Äúelse‚Äù. 

I‚Äôm extremely disappointed with this and after I get the money I will not be coming back to the app. This fraud error thing is really a deal breaker for me. The lack of human interaction made it 10x worse. I suggest to anyone using the app to always be careful, but for me, this is really it, I‚Äôm out!

Thanks for the service you‚Äôve provided until now revolut, but this issue is concerning, and the fact that you guys were unable to see the clearly fraud that I have been charged with is very disappointing.

title: Account randomly shuts down same as many others
text:
Like many other one star reviews, Revolut is a great bank until suddenly and without warning they freeze your account and suspend it. No explanation.

Users will say it‚Äôs our fault, the users fault. I use the bank like any other user, maybe I travel more than usual and that caused a red flag? Whatever it is providing absolutely no explanation and freezing funds as if you are a criminal is not cool. Use the bank but don‚Äôt put your eggs in one basket they notoriously suspend accounts for any reason and since they have so many users they don‚Äôt care if they loose you as a customer or cause inconvenience. Shame.

title: Scam
text: If you don‚Äôt want to keep your account, they send threatening emails saying they‚Äôll put you into collections. Check the T&C VERY carefully. They will scam you out of $$, if you‚Äôre not careful.
Never had a worse experience with an online banking platform‚Ä¶ Revolut is bad news!

title: Pretty much useless

title: Blame Placed on Me for Fraud Case
text: I loved this app, and it was convenient, until my card details were stolen and someone in Brazil used my account to spend hundreds of my dollars. When I reported it to Revolut (before the purchase was even accepted by the merchant) they told me to wait, and if the payment was declined, I‚Äôd get my money back. The merchant accepted the payment and after multiple contacts, was told that it was my fault for not keeping my security information safe. They placed full blame on me taking no blame for not keeping my information safe and not acting when I reported it right away. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE AND TERRIBLE BANKING SERVICE!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

title: Best bank I‚Äôve ever had without a doubt!
text: Having traveled to 35+ countries and having established bank accounts in various countries around the world, I can say without a doubt that Revolut is the absolute best bank I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôd give it 10 stars if possible!

title: Awesome App
text:
As a frequent traveler, I cannot overstate how valuable the Revolut app has made my travels much more convenient and hassle-free, thanks to comprehensive suite of services, including transactions overseas, currency exchange, access to lounges at the airport, and travel insurance. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and convenient tool for managing their finances and travel needs. 

Regards 

Piotr

title: Scam
text:
UPD2: "you have to update to latest version of the app to ...‚Äù. Then I go to AppStore>updates and there‚Äôs ‚Äúopen‚Äù not ‚Äúupdate‚Äù on revolut. You guys are doing EXTREMELY bad job.
UPD: after talking to support who persuaded me that the worse thing that‚Äôs going to happen to me is my account would be downgraded to standard, several months later I‚Äôve received a notification that my account is now below zero (I‚Äôv never used it for anything) and later notification that Revolut might hire external agencies to force me to pay. What‚Äôs more is that I cannot find where to contact their support and close account in that scum organization. Avoid them!
Original review:
I‚Äôll start from the end. After 30 minutes of fighting with the system to just log in into my account, the app proposed a survey. Even survey is so poorly designed that it is impossible to go past question #5. There are only positive, praising answers none of which describes my experience. 
That even before I‚Äôve started on how ridiculous the service is. It was supposed to help me travel, but even with premium plan I couldn‚Äôt transfer enough money to my account. Did by ‚Äòhelp travelling‚Äô you‚Äôve meant ‚Äòuse your normal card and buy yourself and icecream with revolut?‚Äô. If you do not login daily you‚Äôd soon need a full pack of documents to just log in, the push notifications are broken and never keep up with code requests from the app, mostly working with a delay. 
Overall it was a waste of time and money. Useless product with useless services. Don‚Äôt waste your time and money. Simply put - it‚Äôs crap. Unfortunately.

title: Weak app !!
text: I added money with same card twice & somehow they cancelled my account with no explanation & the money was still in it. Not to mention i added cash a month apart. It doesn‚Äôt even get a star to me !

title: A great idea with many flaws
text:
Well, first of all I've been using the app for a year on my Android and I love it for the most part.

But here are the issues that I've objectively noticed:

1. Where is the Web app? I mean it's great when you say mobile only, but how am I going to trust any serious funds if you have only mobile apps? Just odd for my taste.
2. I'm trying to migrate to my iOS device and I just can't. Wherever I try to sign in - it just rejects the credentials. And it asks for some code which I never got in the first place.

I am scared since there is no web app or anything like that, how do I retrieve my funds if anything happens... That's what the story is with those mobile-only solutions. 

A great app otherwise. I disagree that it's overly-complex. But 2 stars since I cannot trust it with any serious money and deposits.

title: Worst experience ever!
text: My bank made a transfer to revolut. The money never arrived on my account. I was writing for 3 months to get the amount back! This is the scariest ‚Äûbanking‚Äú experience I have ever made. Don‚Äôt trust them! Stay away from this company!!!

title: Account Suddenly closed! Over $100 Stolen
text:
I used this company for about 3 months or so, and mostly to use their virtual card service for making purchases in other currencies. I used their services maybe a handful of times. Today when I logged on I saw that my account was suddenly closed, and over $100 of funds was taken from my account leaving me with a zero balance! 

I thought that this must have been some sort of mistake because I have done nothing suspicious that would flag my account. When I contacted customer service they refused to talk to me about it at all. They just kept copy and pasting the same replies ‚Äúwe cannot disclose any further information about your account closure, our decision is final‚Äù 

I was absolutely floored.. I have never had an experience like this with any other company before. If, for whatever reason, my account was flagged then why are they not able to tell me the reason? And why did they take my money from my account and leave me with a zero balance. I tried to escalate the problem to any superiors who could help me but the lady I spoke with refused to allow me to talk to anyone else. She just kept saying the decision is finale and that there was nothing I could do about it. There is absolutely no recourse if this happens! 

I can‚Äôt believe a company like this is allowed to exist.. I wish I would have read reviews on here because I am not the only person this has happened to.. and there are even more complaints online. If you think it won‚Äôt happen to you then I wouldn‚Äôt be too sure, because I never imagined something like this either, and now I lost my money. 

If you‚Äôre reading this then I recommend you take warning and read some of the other reviews, and complaints online. Don‚Äôt just take my word for it.. This is not some random event but is a reoccurring scenario. I would recommend that you use Wise or another app instead, but this is just my opinion. Losing the money didn‚Äôt break my bank but it left me with a bitter taste in my mouth. 

The worst part is that there is absolutely no recourse.. you are dead in the water if they decide to close your account. I don‚Äôt even think the lady I was speaking with knew why they closed my account, and it was clear that she was trained to provide as little help and information as possible. There are no managers to speak to or supervisors. 

So reader take warning! Do your research, and look elsewhere for a reliable company to handle and keep your money. For reference here is the ‚Äúreason‚Äù they closed my account and took my funds ‚ÄúAs a financial service institution, Revolut conducts checks to ensure customer‚Äôs privacy and account safety. Sometimes this means that the have to close an account due to exceptional circumstances. We reserve the right to do so as part of our Terms and Policies, which you can read more about here:‚Äù 

Yeah it‚Äôs just just nonsense that doesn‚Äôt tell you anything. This is why they closed my account and took my funds lol.. whatever, lesson learned I guess.

title: Transfer Diverted back to sender for no reason
text: I paid $35 from my other bank account to wire it into my revolut account. i needed to pay my landlord overseas and this was the cheapest option. all day the wire never posted despite the sending bank saying they received it. all of my info was tripple checked correct. this already made me very nervous but every agent i spoke to said that wires into their accounts can take up to 2 business days. i‚Äôve always thought it was same day. at 7pm (nearly 10 hours after i first sent the wire) revolut says they‚Äôd reversed the wire back and it will take 5 business days to go back into my account. FOR NO REASON but the ‚Äúautomatic system‚Äù had a glitch and sent it back. that‚Äôs absolutely pathetic. If they wanted to help me they could have!
